title: Why isn't there a list of links to download all music used in LoL on official site? Legal issues?
body: I've just been wondering about that, we can freely see artworks or cinematics but can't listen to the favorite LoL music in our players? I know I could dig up some on the internet, but why not make it easier for everyone?

You do realize that networking and music&sound are two different teams, right?
But where is the Final Boss Veigar theme from the teaser RPG video?
Will Dunkmaster Darius' theme go up there? The one you used in his spotlight? That tune is sick.
Do you guys have the old themes from Season 1/2 of the game? Especially the Harrowing/Snowdown ones?
Why don't you just google it, like literally everybody else?  And if you mean **SOUND FILES**, not "*LoL music*" you downloaded all of that crap that you hear in game when you downloaded the game.
To be fair, sound files are needlessly annoying to get to. Or at least they were like a year ago anyway.
